documentation.xhtml: Pointer to 1st memory area to be compared with the 2nd memory area
Pointer to 2nd memory area to be compared with the 1st memory area
Amount of bytes to be compared
System dependent implementation of the memory compare function

ST.xhtml: SysDepMemCmp := MemCmp( pBuf1 := pData1, pBuf2 := pData2, n := DataLen);

documentation.xhtml: Pointer to memory address to be copied to (target)
Pointer to memory address to be copied from (source)
Amount of bytes to be copied
System dependent implementation of the memory copy function

ST.xhtml: SysDepMemCpy := MemCpy( destAddr := pdest, srcAddr := pSrc, n := DataLen);

documentation.xhtml: Pointer to memory address to be filled (target)
Value with which the memory is to be initialized
Amount of bytes to be initialized in the memory block
System dependent implementation of the memory set function

ST.xhtml: SysDepMemSet := MemSet( destAddr := pdest, fillByte := Value, n := DataLen);
